course_description: This course explores the industrial organization of health care markets in the U.S. We will focus on hospital production and competition, information asymmetries, vertical integration between physicians and hospitals, insurance markets, and insurer and hospital bargaining.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E103
sections: Class Nbr: 2883, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: I. McCarthy, Status: Open
